title: Black Medium Small Square

adjectives: Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

description: A medium-small-sized square shaded completely black. Smaller than the ⬛ Black Large Square and ◾ Black Medium-Small Square but larger than the  ▪️ Black Small Square.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the black medium-small square emoji presents as a perfectly rendered, solid obsidian shape with subtle, soft rounded edges that catch the light. Its deep, matte black finish, characteristic of Apple's refined aesthetic, conveys a sense of order, emphasis, or a placeholder for content. This precisely designed square on Apple devices is often used to create visual structure or mark a specific point within text.
